verses.name: 2 Kings 19:33
verses.text: By the way that he came, by the same shall he return, and shall not come into this city, saith the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:34
verses.text: For I will defend this city, to save it, for mine own sake, and for my servant David’s sake.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:35
verses.text: And it came to pass that night, that the angel of the Lord went out, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians an hundred fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:36
verses.text: So Sennacherib king of Assyria departed, and went and returned, and dwelt at Nineveh.
